title: Blue Essence Art. Need 1 Blue Essence.
body: Need 1 Blue Essence for Level 6 Renekton figured I would give this a try. Thanks!

replies.body: Yea I know you guys have done Rp art so i figured I would give Blue Essence Art. Thanks for the reply though

It looks like Renekton might be needed if that shark comes any closer!   We don't currently provide gifts like essences, but I appreciate your drawing!  You may be able to grab some extra essences through other ways like shards via the store.  I hope that helps!
